sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID ,A.SVN_REP_ID, B.SVN_REP_NM, B.SVN_REP_URL ,A.REVISION_NUM, A.REVISION_COMMENT ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM FLW1400 A INNER JOIN SVN1000 B ON ( A.SVN_REP_ID = B.SVN_REP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#) INNER JOIN FLW1100 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = C.FLOW_ID ) WHERE 1=1
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND B.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY B.SVN_REP_ID, A.REVISION_NUM DESC
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,B.PRJ_NM ,A.PROCESS_ID ,A.PROCESS_NM ,COALESCE(A.PROCESS_DESC , ' ') AS PROCESS_DESC ,A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD ,A.PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD ,( SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM ADM4100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MST_CD = 'CMM00005' AND SUB_CD = A.PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD ) AS PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_NM ,CLOB_TO_CHAR(A.PROCESS_JSON_DATA) AS PROCESS_JSON_DATA ,A.USE_CD ,A.PROCESS_ORD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM FLW1000 A LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD = '02'
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY A.PROCESS_ORD,A.REG_DTM

SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.PROCESS_ID ,A.PROCESS_NM ,A.PROCESS_DESC ,A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD ,A.PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD ,( SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM ADM4100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MST_CD = 'CMM00005' AND SUB_CD = A.PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD ) AS PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_NM ,CLOB_TO_CHAR(A.PROCESS_JSON_DATA) AS PROCESS_JSON_DATA ,A.USE_CD ,A.PROCESS_ORD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM FLW1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE FLW1000 A SET
A.PROCESS_NM = #processNm# ,A.PROCESS_DESC = #processDesc# ,A.PROCESS_ORD = #processOrd#
,
A.PROCESS_JSON_DATA = #processJsonData#
,A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD = #processConfirmCd#
,A.PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD = #processMiddleDoneCd#
,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp#
WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_PROCESS_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_PROCESS_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'PCS' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_PROCESS_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(PROCESS_ID) AS NEW_PROCESS_ID FROM FLW1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID LIKE 'PCS' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO FLW1000 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_NM ,PROCESS_DESC ,PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD, PROCESS_MIDDLE_DONE_CD, PROCESS_JSON_DATA ,USE_CD, PROCESS_ORD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #newProcessId#, #processNm# ,#processDesc# ,#processConfirmCd#, #processMiddleDoneCd#, '' ,'01', #processOrd# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLW1000 A SET USE_CD = '02' ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#

SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.FLOW_NEXT_ID ,A.FLOW_NM, A.FLOW_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.FLOW_SIGN_CD, A.FLOW_END_CD ,A.FLOW_WORK_CD, A.FLOW_REVISION_CD, A.FLOW_DPL_CD ,A.FLOW_AUTH_CD, A.FLOW_SIGN_STOP_CD ,A.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR, A.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR, A.FLOW_CONTENT_BG_COLOR, A.FLOW_CONTENT_COLOR ,A.OPT_CNT, A.REQ_TOTAL_CNT, A.REQ_CHARGE_CNT ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT B.*, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLW1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND Z.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID ) AS OPT_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND Z.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID ) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND Z.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID AND Z.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #usrId# ) AS REQ_CHARGE_CNT FROM FLW1100 B
INNER JOIN FLW1000 C ON ( B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND B.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID)
WHERE 1=1
AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND C.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD = '02'
AND B.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) A START WITH A.FLOW_NEXT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.FLOW_ID = A.FLOW_NEXT_ID AND PRIOR A.PROCESS_ID = A.PROCESS_ID ORDER BY A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, LEVEL DESC

SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.FLOW_NEXT_ID ,A.FLOW_NM, A.FLOW_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.FLOW_SIGN_CD, A.FLOW_END_CD ,A.FLOW_WORK_CD, A.FLOW_REVISION_CD, A.FLOW_DPL_CD ,A.FLOW_AUTH_CD, A.FLOW_SIGN_STOP_CD ,A.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR, A.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR, A.FLOW_CONTENT_BG_COLOR, A.FLOW_CONTENT_COLOR ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM FLW1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLW1100 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID ,FLOW_NEXT_ID, FLOW_NM, FLOW_ESSENTIAL_CD ,FLOW_SIGN_CD, FLOW_END_CD, FLOW_WORK_CD ,FLOW_REVISION_CD, FLOW_DPL_CD ,FLOW_AUTH_CD, FLOW_SIGN_STOP_CD ,FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR ,FLOW_TITLE_COLOR, FLOW_CONTENT_BG_COLOR, FLOW_CONTENT_COLOR ,USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #flowId# ,#flowNextId#, #flowNm#, #flowEssentialCd# ,#flowSignCd#, #flowEndCd#, #flowWorkCd# ,#flowRevisionCd#, #flowDplCd# ,#FlowAuthCd#, #flowSignStopCd# ,#flowTitleBgColor# ,#flowTitleColor#, #flowContentBgColor#, #flowContentColor# ,'01' ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE FLW1100 A SET
A.FLOW_NEXT_ID = null
A.FLOW_NEXT_ID = #flowNextId#
A.FLOW_NM = #flowNm#
,A.FLOW_ESSENTIAL_CD = #flowEssentialCd#
,A.FLOW_SIGN_CD = #flowSignCd#
,A.FLOW_SIGN_STOP_CD = #flowSignStopCd#
,A.FLOW_END_CD = #flowEndCd#
,A.FLOW_WORK_CD = #flowWorkCd#
,A.FLOW_REVISION_CD = #flowRevisionCd#
,A.FLOW_DPL_CD = #flowDplCd#
,A.FLOW_AUTH_CD = #flowAuthCd#
,A.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR = #flowTitleBgColor# ,A.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR = #flowTitleColor# ,A.FLOW_CONTENT_BG_COLOR = #flowContentBgColor# ,A.FLOW_CONTENT_COLOR = #flowContentColor#
,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp#
WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#

UPDATE FLW1100 A SET USE_CD = '02' ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PROCESS_ID, T1.FLOW_ID, T1.ITEM_ID ,T1.ITEM_VALUE ,T1.CHG_DTM ,COALESCE(( CASE T1.ITEM_CODE WHEN '04' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.ITEM_VALUE,'1') WHEN '05' THEN (SELECT REQ_CLS_NM FROM REQ4000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = T1.PRJ_ID AND REQ_CLS_ID = T1.ITEM_VALUE) WHEN '06' THEN SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_VALUE, '2') ELSE NULL END ),' ') AS ITEM_VALUE_NM ,T1.VALUE_IN_DTM ,T1.ITEM_NM, T1.ITEM_CODE, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,T1.ITEM_TYPE, T1.ITEM_LENGTH, T1.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, T1.ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,T1.ITEM_SD_CD, T1.ITEM_ORD, T1.USE_CD ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', T1.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', T1.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00002', T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM, '1') AS ITEM_ROW_NUM_STR ,SF_ADM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_STR ,T1.REG_DTM ,T1.REG_USR_ID, T1.REG_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.ITEM_ID ,B.ITEM_VALUE ,B.REG_DTM AS VALUE_IN_DTM ,C.CHG_DTM ,A.ITEM_NM, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, A.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,A.ITEM_TYPE, A.ITEM_LENGTH, A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,A.ITEM_SD_CD, A.ITEM_ORD, A.USE_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM FLW1200 A LEFT OUTER JOIN FLW1300 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID = #reqId#) INNER JOIN REQ4700 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = C.CHG_FLOW_ID AND C.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND C.REQ_CHG_TYPE != '02') WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) T1 ORDER BY T1.CHG_DTM, T1.ITEM_ORD

SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PROCESS_ID, T1.FLOW_ID, T1.ITEM_ID ,T1.ITEM_VALUE, T1.REG_DTM AS VALUE_IN_DTM ,T1.ITEM_NM, T1.ITEM_CODE, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,T1.ITEM_TYPE, T1.ITEM_LENGTH, T1.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, T1.ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,T1.ITEM_SD_CD, T1.ITEM_ORD, T1.USE_CD ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', T1.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', T1.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00002', T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM, '1') AS ITEM_ROW_NUM_STR ,SF_ADM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_STR ,T1.REG_DTM ,T1.REG_USR_ID, T1.REG_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.ITEM_ID ,B.ITEM_VALUE, B.REG_DTM AS VALUE_IN_DTM ,A.ITEM_NM, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, A.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,A.ITEM_TYPE, A.ITEM_LENGTH, A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,A.ITEM_SD_CD, A.ITEM_ORD, A.USE_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM FLW1200 A LEFT JOIN FLW1300 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID = #reqId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD, A.REG_DTM DESC ) T1

SELECT C.ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS FILE_NAME ,C.FILE_SIZE ,C.REG_DTM FROM FLW1200 A LEFT OUTER JOIN FLW1300 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID = #reqId#) INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL C ON ( C.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ITEM_VALUE ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.ITEM_CODE = '03' ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD, C.FILE_SN
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FLW1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'OPT' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_ITEM_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(ITEM_ID) AS NEW_ITEM_ID FROM FLW1200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.ITEM_ID LIKE 'OPT' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO FLW1200 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID, ITEM_ID ,ITEM_NM, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_COMMON_CODE, ITEM_ROW_NUM ,ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_LENGTH, ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,ITEM_SD_CD, ITEM_ORD ,USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #flowId#, #newItemId# ,#itemNm#, #itemCode#, #itemCommonCode#, #itemRowNum# ,#itemType#, COALESCE(#itemLength#,255), #itemEssentialCd#, #itemModifyCd# ,#itemSdCd#, COALESCE(#itemOrd#,0) ,'01' ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )

INSERT INTO FLW1200 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID, ITEM_ID ,ITEM_NM, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_COMMON_CODE, ITEM_ROW_NUM ,ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_LENGTH, ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, ITEM_MODIFY_CD ,ITEM_SD_CD, ITEM_ORD, USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #flowId#, #itemId# ,#itemNm#, #itemCode#, #itemCommonCode#, #itemRowNum# ,#itemType#, COALESCE(#itemLength#,255), #itemEssentialCd#, #itemModifyCd# ,#itemSdCd#, COALESCE(#itemOrd#,0) ,'01' ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLW1200 A SET ITEM_NM = #itemNm# ,ITEM_CODE = #itemCode# ,ITEM_COMMON_CODE = #itemCommonCode# ,ITEM_ROW_NUM = #itemRowNum# ,ITEM_TYPE = #itemType# ,ITEM_LENGTH = #itemLength# ,ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #itemEssentialCd# ,ITEM_MODIFY_CD = #itemModifyCd# ,ITEM_ORD = #itemOrd# ,ITEM_SD_CD = #itemSdCd# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE FLW1200 A SET USE_CD = '02' ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLW1300 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID, REQ_ID ,ITEM_ID, ITEM_VALUE ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #flowId#, #reqId# ,#itemId#, #itemValue# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLW1300 A SET ITEM_VALUE = #itemValue# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLW1400 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID ,SVN_REP_ID, REVISION_NUM, REVISION_COMMENT ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #processId#, #flowId# ,#svnRepId#, #revisionNum#, #revisionComment# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLW1400 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.SVN_REP_ID = #svnRepId# AND A.REVISION_NUM = #revisionNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS REP_CNT FROM FLW1400 A, SVN1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SVN_REP_ID = B.SVN_REP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.SVN_REP_ID = #svnRepId# AND A.REVISION_NUM = #revisionNum# AND B.USE_CD = '01'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLW1500 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID ,AUTH_GRP_ID, AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #flowId# ,#authGrpId#, #authGrpTargetCd# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLW1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD = #authGrpTargetCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.PRJ_ID ,T1.PROCESS_ID ,T1.FLOW_ID ,T1.AUTH_GRP_ID ,T1.AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD ,T1.AUTH_GRP_NM ,T1.AUTH_GRP_DESC ,T1.CREATE_DT ,T1.USE_CD ,T1.USR_TYP ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', T1.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM ,T1.ORD FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD ,B.AUTH_GRP_NM ,B.AUTH_GRP_DESC ,B.CREATE_DT ,B.USE_CD ,B.USR_TYP ,B.ORD FROM FLW1500 A INNER JOIN ADM1100 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD = #authGrpTargetCd#
AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) T1 ORDER BY T1.ORD

SELECT COUNT(*) AS AUTH_GRP_CNT FROM FLW1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_TARGET_CD = #authGrpTargetCd#

SELECT A.* FROM FLW1300 A INNER JOIN FLW1200 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.ITEM_VALUE IS NOT NULL AND B.ITEM_CODE = '03'
